summary: HEADLIGHT BULBS CONTINUOUSLY BURNOUT.  HAVE REQUIRED REPLACEMENT EVERY 2000-2500 MILES OR LESS.  SOMETIMES ONE SIDE BURNS OUT ONLY.  WHEN THAT SIDE IS REPLACED, THE OTHER SIDE WILL BURNOUT IN 2 WEEKS OR LESS TIME UNDER NORMAL HIGHWAY DRIVING.  THIS IS MAJOR SAFETY DEFECT THAT IS KNOWN TO VW.
